\documentclass[11pt,oneside]{report}

% --- Basic encoding and fonts ---
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage{lmodern}
\usepackage{microtype}

% --- Load graphicx early so \graphicspath is defined ---
\usepackage{graphicx}

% --- Page layout ---
\usepackage{geometry}
\geometry{margin=1in}

% --- Hyperlinks for internal PDF links ---
\usepackage{hyperref}
\hypersetup{
  colorlinks   = true,
  linkcolor    = blue,
  citecolor    = blue,
  urlcolor     = blue,
  pdftitle     = {$title$},
  pdfauthor    = {$author$}
}

% --- Additional useful packages ---
\usepackage{float}
\usepackage{longtable}       % Provides the longtable environment
\usepackage{booktabs}        % Defines commands like \toprule, \midrule, etc.
\usepackage{array}
\usepackage{amsmath,amssymb}

% --- Header and footer ---
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\pagestyle{fancy}
\fancyhf{}
\lhead{$title$}
\rhead{\thepage}
\setlength{\headheight}{15pt}

% --- Custom commands to support Pandoc output ---
\newcommand{\pandocbounded}[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\tightlist}{%
  \setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}\setlength{\parskip}{0pt}}

% --- Document begins ---
\begin{document}

% Title page (if a title is provided)
$if(title)$
\begin{titlepage}
  \centering
  \vspace*{1cm}
  {\Huge\bfseries $title$\par}
  \vspace{1.5cm}
  {\Large\itshape $author$\par}
  \vfill
  {\large $date$\par}
  \vspace{1cm}
\end{titlepage}
$endif$

% Optional abstract
$if(abstract)$
\begin{abstract}
$abstract$
\end{abstract}
$endif$

\tableofcontents
\newpage

$body$

\end{document}
